loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira.
registerDescription: Uzuza ibisabwa kugira ngo ufungure konti yawe.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Andika kandi ubike mu buryo bworoshye amanota y'abanyeshuri ku masomo atandukanye.
featureReportCardsDesc: Kora mu buryo bwikora raporo zuzuye z'abanyeshuri.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Ohereza incamake y'amanota n'amakuru mashya ku babyeyi ukoresheje SMS/Email (Mu Minsi Iri Imbere).
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Kora raporo zifite ireme ku barimu n'abanyeshuri.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Tanga kandi ukurikirane imikoro n'imishinga y'abanyeshuri (Mu Minsi Iri Imbere).
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika mu mutekano amafoto y'abanyeshuri n'inyandiko z'ingenzi (Mu Minsi Iri Imbere).
featureCommunicationDesc: Koroshya itumanaho hagati y'abarimu n'ubuyobozi bw'ishuri.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho ibipimo fatizo bya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kugaragaza gutsinda/gutsindwa.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe w'urupapuro.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha kuri email ku byabaye muri sisitemu ateganyijwe mu minsi iri imbere.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiza by'ikirenga nko kohereza muri PDF/Excel n'imenyesha kuri SMS/email birateganywa. Kohereza muri CSV guhari gufasha kubona amakuru y'ibanze.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
